segments.text: This kitchen is disgusting with all that water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clogged or something, faucet just gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is soaked, and she keeps drying that plate like a robot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing on the floor—filthy and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids are making it worse, climbing up there with dirty hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's reaching into the cookie jar, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks grimy, who knows what's on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, waiting to eat stolen cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water running down the cabinets—it's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, but inside it's a pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't touch anything in this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the whole scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They need to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a revolting display of carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
